summary: This is a brief email chain regarding the organization of documents related to Ghislaine Maxwell's testimony and witness 3500 material. It involves coordination between US Attorney's Office personnel to save attachments to shared folders.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced as the subject of testimony and witness 3500 materials in an email about document management.

keyFacts: Email discusses handling of 'Maxwell testifying witness 3500' materials.
Correspondence involves personnel from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
Documents were to be saved in 'relevant folders on the Epstein share' indicating organized case management.
The communication is dated June 22-23, 2021, during Maxwell's trial preparation period.
Shows procedural coordination between legal team members regarding evidence organization.
